details: Add Essie Gel Longwear for just $5 and enjoy a chip-resistant manicure with shine and durability that lasts up to 15 days, similar to gel, but with the ease of regular polish.
Experience a quick-drying, chip-resistant manicure with a flawless finish that lasts up to 14 days.
Personalize your nails with up to two custom designs in you set. Simply share your inspiration with your nail technician.
Soak Off only will be $20, if you want a soak off with a new acrylic set the soak off price will be $12
